data.suggestion: Reni and Zen find a spicy draft of a story, about a roguish wolf, a mage-in-training, and a dragon princess, hidden amongst the game books (follow-up to Team B D&D)
Professor Raine: Magic 101, the basics of spellcasting and the first spells Templar or Keidran learn.
Flora dressed up as a pizza delivery guy, bringing you all your favorite midnight foods!
Species Swap: Maddie and Karen
vv-Mike climbing out of the swimming pool
Brutus and Fem!Clovis as Kronk and Yzma from "The Emporer's New Groove," reenacting the "pull the lever" scene.
Zen as the Mandalorian with Baby Nibbly
Tigress Trace Dressed in a traditional Hanfu, and Flora in a Qipao to Celebrate The Year Of the Tiger.
Chimera celebrates New Year's Eve with the others and when they throw the first firecrackers, chimera and the stoneward bring the firecrackers back to the horror of the others
Kat and Maren open up a keidran wellness salon with grooming and massages.

An Au Natural Laura disembarks a boat/ship upon arrival at the Basidian Islands and is met by Lynn, who literally/verbally throws the book on Basitin Laws and Culture at her. Her reaction in chibi form.
The masked bandit Zorro (Mike) faces off against the villainous highwayman Carver in a sword fight to protect the fair maiden Erilas.
Male Mike daki
Sythe catches Maren trying on a new set of lingerie complete with faux kitty ears and cat tail. Maren angrily protests that it's just cosplay. Sythe is a fan, either way.
A magical mishap transforms young Rose into a were-dragon!
Raine and Kathrin Bodyswap: Kathrin activates Raine's fully-wolf form, and Raine frantically stops her from disrobing. "You're naked in *my* body." "IT'S NOT THE SAME!!!"
What would Kathrin look like if here canine half was more pronounced
Kat and Flora if their faces were made in Toms more modern style (Like the tigress meanies)
Trace and Flora face off against Raine(Halfkind) and Red in a snowman building competition in Legacy garden, that quickly devolves into a snowball fight!
Brutus and Clovis as Tsukasa and Hinata from Fantasy Bishoujo Juniku Ojisan To, although presumably Brutus has no problem with their lovey dovey relationship :)
Vixen barkeep at a bar in coastal fox territories
Sythe watches a performance of Red and the Templar Theater Troupe. He is impressed by Red's brilliant acting.
Epic shot of mighty lady Nora fighting the black creature summoned by Trace in chapter 7.
Raine finds Adira playing in the snow, and can't help but dive into the snow herself.
Laura Survives AU: Laura hands the leash over to Keith. He's not sure what to do with it.
Zen tied Sythe to chair to show him how its done.
Raine & Rose AU: Raine turns into a human form for the first time in her conscious life, gets scared, but Rose calms her down.

Sequel to wolf Mary: young Mary Silverlock meets a Young Euchre and Rose while infiltrating their village in her Keidran transformation. Mary went in the fur to blend in, much to her embarrassment; the two cousins aren't wearing clothes either.
50s Diner Kat
Wrong fox. Drunk Keith in restaurant flirting with Clovis confused him with Laura
The rabbit girl magician turns her lovely assistant, Mike, into a female bunny girl in order to pull her out of a hat! Oh how the tables turn...
Zen and Natani as hunters from the game Bloodborne
Clovis as a Roman emperor, sitting on his throne, with his guards on either side.
good morning Alaric
AU in which Flora found Keith instead.
Keith and Natani spar with swords, Keith keeps scoring points by swatting Natani's rump! Natani is obviously flustered
Clovis' own home security magic doesn't recognize him as a woman, and instead poofs him into a slavegirl outfit and tells him to be a good girl and wait for Master Clovis.
When Clovis threatens to kill Evals, Mike discovers he can transform into the very vixen form to gain amazing Amazonian battle prowess, and an epic battle ensues
Northern Basitin Adelaide in the buff
A human diplomat sits down to enjoy a meal with Basitins, only to realize one of the local spices is incredibly psychoactive for humans
Mike offering the viewer a handful of Bunny Girl (Bunny sitting on his hand like a bench)
Maren at the door of his room invites Sythe to enter
AU: Having learned the transformation spell, Trace uses it on himself instead of Mary, intending to reshape the Templar order into a Keidran one. Euchre approves.
Modern TK- Maeve meets Maddie the Basitin Exchange Student at School
Laura meets her prehistoric and modern counterparts.
Pregnancy hormones cause Flora to become very... active in bed. Trace tries to escape, but fails.
Maeve dressing Maddie up as a Tiger
Very Vixen Eric

Maren and Sythe furtively try to find out each other’s preferences, and turn to their ex’s, Flora and Trace, respectively. Unfortunately, as it turned out, the latter have very distant ideas about what their ex’s really like.
Modern Trio apartment floorplan/concept, with chibi Laura, Willow and Kat faces indicating their rooms
Desert dwelling bastions? What life for them may be like?
Steel Commanders (song by Sabaton) 'B team' as a tank crew mid battle.

Trace and Flora flying home on Reni's back after some Christmas shopping, Trace presenting a little early present for her as he rubs her belly and hugs her, saying "I already have all I want for Christmas~."
New Years at the Legacy Estate: Madelyn and Karen amuse the gang with an impromptu fireworks show. All is going well until they find a box marked made by Nora.
Dark AU : After regaining his memories. Trace Legacy returns to the heart of the Templars' operations with his new wife, Flora. A keidran woman who appears just as sinister as her husband.
Sythe showing Maren some more traditional Keidran dance techniques
Genderswap AU: Tracy's Evil Smoke Hallucination having a freakout/mental breakdown about the pregnancy
Trace and Flora out shopping for stuff they are gonna need for the baby and they run into Maren and Sythe: A coincidence or a secret revealed?
Flora Fazkind: The main four as scary animatronics from a certain pizzeria.
Wolf Raine and Maren at new year party.
Maeve and Adira feeding ducks in a park
King Adelaide holding Sythe... like a scythe
What a party! the snow wolf and northern basitin wake in a vary messed up room and lots of bottles and both of them in bed together, and notice the Snow leopard couple making breakfast
Raine running on all fours chasing a cat like dogs do
After the New Years Party, Sythe carries Maren to her bedroom, who proceeds to kiss him while in a drunken state.
Ora (Flora/Nora fused) does the Flora pounce on Trace, cut to Trace in a hospital bed in a full body cast. Oops
A Husky Keidran has to ask a snow leopard girl for directions in the forest because he has to bring mail to the snow leopard village
Keith teaches Natani to read
Lady Nora hits Eric with a Spell of Keidranification and he becomes a male snow leopard.
Ivy character sheet
Flora hosting an infomercial for "or whatever" brand magical products, such as a fridge or a telephone.
New Years aftermath at the Riftwall, unusable magic, dozens of drunks and a crashed dragon
Reni is recreating an album cover from the '60s called "Whipped Cream and Other Delights" by Herb Alpert. Basically, she's wearing nothing but whipped cream. A lot of it...
A painting of Maren done like the Mona Lisa, The Mona Maren

In TwoKinds High, Very Vixen Mike to her embarrassment wears the female uniform for the first time, and Erilas and Kathrin, who knows what happened, are complementing how beautiful she currently looks.
Flora and tiger trace in Tigers hoodies
Modern Raine and Maren are engaged in fitness to get themselves in good shape for the summer. Maren dressed quite lewd, which distracts Raine from the exercises.
Librarian Ms. Raine Silverlock returning books to their shelves
Keith and Natani snuggling under a blanket in a cabin watching the snow fall outside the window
Saria and Trace's wedding. Rose as Saria's bridesmaid. Rose is very worried about the Templars' reaction to Keidran, but Saria cheers her on.
Personality swap AU - Natani is an excited, pounce-happy naked wolf diving at Keith, while Flora is a fit, muscular serious type with a bandaged secret Trace discovers.
Maddie as Kenpachi Zaraki and Maeve as Yachiru from Bleach

While visiting the Riftwall Tavern, Willow rests her lantern on the bar counter. Windstraw tries to douse the flame since "fire and alcohol aren't safe in close proximity", leading to both characters freaking out.
Adelaide and Maddie's father (back turned and face hidden) sitting on a secluded beach together watching the sunset. Adelaide saying something like "I've really missed you."
Modern AU Kat takes Laura to her hairdresser, Maren.
Trace Legacy CEO of Templar Inc presents the new TPhone 14s at a major tech event to a cheering crowd of familiar faces, his wife Flora watches and smiles from backstage.
Trace and Laura kissing and embracing each other in their honeymoon at a beach at sunset.
Saria (maybe lioness Saria) going for a hike in the woods around the estate area.

A Twokinds take on the classic arcade game Charley Chuck's Food Fight. Trace as Charley Chuck, who's trying to get to and eat a pretzel while being hounded by Templar chefs. Set in the canteen of a Templar Academy. Bird's eye view.
Sequel to Camping Modern Trio: the morning after, the trio decide to take a dip in the nearby forest lake, except they find out too late that the water is somewhat colder than expected
Keith and Natani going out for a romantic Valentine's day dinner
Carver successfully assimilated by the western basitin ladies. Loincloth and all.
Kat (with sewing table in background) presenting Flora with baby "onesie" suit with provisions for a tail and cat ears.
Vixen Eric sneaking into the ladies lockerroom
Sealeen, Landon and small dragon Seraphina dressed as Jessie, James, and Meowth, respectively, here to cause vague inconveniences
Coppertone Reni. Little Nibbly tugs down the back of the big dragon's bathing suit, right in front of Captain Kei!
Group B plays strip poker! Maren and Zen are doing fairly well, Raine's cheating using magic, and Sythe's wondering what he'll have to bet now that he's lost his only article of clothing.

The Fox and the Grapes. Laura spots a bunch of juicy looking grapes growing in a tree, but is unable to reach them. Keith gives Laura a shoulder lift, but upon biting into them, she discovers that the grapes are... absolutely delicious, the best grapes she's ever tasted!
Karen gains a new set of ears, this time the Basitin variant ‒ and finds them quite sensitive to the touch.
Willow, Kathrin and Laura in human version have snowballs fight
Bath for time Natani - she also could ask Keith to wash her paws, he get blushed because ankles uncovered

Gangster AU cat clan syndicate bar/lounge burlesque scene. Dazzling showcats/waitstaff in dangly sequin dresses and feather headbands work wonders keeping the regulars oblivious to 'business as usual' barside dealings.
Modern AU dodgeball tourney - Maeve and Maddie are the last players standing.
Reference Sheet: Eastern Basitin Master General Nikolai Alaric

Modern AU: Gamer Laura is streaming a game when Kat walks by in the fur, giving Laura's watchers an eyeful. Laura tells her to leave, but upon realizing the huge amount of kudos and tips she got due to this, she yells to a confused Kat to come back.
Good Morning Very Vixen Wolf Maren together with Kat for some reason :)
Tribal Kathrin, Adira and Maeve are fishing in a canoe on a river.

Year of the Tiger: Lady Nora has a bit of fun celebrating the new year by turning members of the cast into Tiger Keidran. And because it's Nora, no doubt some will have attractive attributes enhanced or even swap a few genders around.
Laura enslaved AU: Laura is modeling for a painting Eric is doing.
Eric tries to buy Rose from Saria to be his model. Neither are amused by the offer.
Zen and Raine out and about in a bustling city square, Zen playfully teasing Raine about how cute she looks in his Flannel shirt.
Summer Postcard - Featuring Willow, Kat and Laura at the beach.
Clovis giving Brutus a foot massage for his good work.
Naga Nora - Lady Nora as a sultry snake, seductively posing for the viewer
